documentation.text:
@title EtherCast - Minimal on-chain ledger of affirmations
 @notice Stores a hash of an affirmation and lightweight metadata.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct EtherCast.Affirmation storage ref[] storage ref
struct EtherCast.Affirmation storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct EtherCast.Affirmation storage ref[] storage pointer,struct EtherCast.Affirmation storage ref)

documentation.text: @dev Cast an affirmation. The contract does not see the plaintext, only the hash.
